website_summaries.verdict: Basic chisel set that works well for those who need solid performance but don't want to spend too much.
pros: 3 chisels included in set with most commonly used sizes of 0.5", 0.75", and 1" wide
Hardened steel blades tend to hold edge even after repeated use
Handles with sturdy grips are comfortable to use
Chisels ship in a small pouch that makes the tools easy to carry in a pocket or tool belt
cons: Lacks the versatility of some chisel sets with more tools

customer_reviews.title: What is quality and new today?
customer_reviews.text: Opened the chisels to find the smallest one to have a rounded corner, then looking at the largest chisel it has dings with rolling on the edge as if it was used against wood with a nail in it. It was to be new but can’t see how the larger chisel could be. Either way for $4-5 more you can buy a 4 pack of stanly or Irwin at the big box hardware store. Save you cash here and go to the store!
customer_reviews.author: jonh88

customer_reviews.title: Good to have when need arises.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to help install hardwares on a newly built gate. I’m not a carpenter or even an amateur wood working guy. But sharp lines and precise depth were achieved, thanks to all the rehearsing in mind and tools that could deliver. I don’t even have the lovely wooden mallet seen in some of the ads. Took my rubber mallet to the task. These chisels allowed me to chip at the angles desired and I earned myself a clean result. I’d recommend practice on same type of scrap wood to learn the way of the chisels. Once you know their tendency it’s a lot easier to get to where you want together.
customer_reviews.author: Roamingwesty

customer_reviews.title: I am Fussy
customer_reviews.text: Ok I am damn fussy, I have a old abused set of chisels from 50 years of use, Stanley and they were prefect. But sometimes in the heat of just getting a project done they lead a tough life. These are better, and they come in a beautifully thought out canvas case and they are sharp, very sharp. Looking forward to using these and taking care of a proper good tool.
customer_reviews.author: BGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a set of chisels! I ordered these thinking I just needed a cheap set of chisels for a project and i am familiar with the Irwin brand. But holy balls, these are a quality tools! And the carrying case is awesome, usually they just roll around my truck. I feel like I lucked out on this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lchbuilders

customer_reviews.title: Irwin, I'm loving these chisels. You've got some beautiful steel!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp out of the case (Nice case, well-built little blade covers too), VERY solid steel one-piece with a grippy handle that is pretty large even in my big hands (not too big, just hefty and curvy/ergonomic). I haven't even sharpened them yet, but so far wood carving of all sorts has been wonderful! If I was a serious professional I'd give a more in-depth review but as the first set of seriously well-built chisels I've ever owned, I am very happy with these! A good mix of 3 sizes, though I will be investing in a larger set one day. Make sure to get a good mallet! Though these have open steel bottoms, they can obviously take a serious beating.
customer_reviews.author: Soho42

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase of this product. Received sharpened, I sharpened them again anyhow to remove the protective film on them. But, could well be used straight out the protective cover.The chisels protective holder is very nice and built surprisingly well .The chisels are very solid and well built as well, I like that the steel of the chisel is running through the handle to create a head that can be used with a regular hammer. And these chisels are keeping a sharpened edge so far, and I have used on some oak. I would purchase this product again, and would highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than anticipated!!!
customer_reviews.text: Much higher quality and larger than anticipated. With the case, it a great addition to the tool chest. I'll only use occasionally, I'm no pro, which this set is beyound any project I'll use them for. Good buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Benefit of the doubt

customer_reviews.title: which is great. The case is nice
customer_reviews.text: They come useable out of the box, which is great. The case is nice, but I worry about moisture, because of the nylon. The grips are comfortable and the metal striking cap, makes for a long lasting handle. As others mentioned, a little more polish and they're easily a woodworkers chisel and considerally more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Wallet useless. Chisels OK.
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is useless as there is no way to hang or otherwise attach it to anything. The chisels are mediocre and comparable to a $25 DeWalt set while being harder to sharpen yet not holding an edge longer to compensate. I do like the grip though.
customer_reviews.author: Bing

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Did some deck post replacements... these chisels paid for themselves during the first weekend I used them. I don't do much woodworking, and I've seen other chisels out there for much, much more, but, for the average homeowner who needs to clean out a door jamb area for a striker plate or clean out a deck post notch, I highly reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: j64thnotes

customer_reviews.title: Utility Chisels, Not quite woodworking chisels.
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the best chisels that money can buy, but have a nice metal end so they can be good for doing rough work with a hammer. If you're using these for woodworking with hardwoods, you will have to sharpen them a fair amount, and I would recommend a good honing guide if you're going with these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: What a great set. The price when I got it was very low. I love the steel head, but I'd never hit it really hard. I really wanted a straight bevel and sharpen often than the hassle of a double bevel that is sharper but needs more frequent sharpening. The pouch is very heavy duty. Maybe the steel isn't what it used to be, but unless you are a craftsman with no power tools and doing exotic joints by hand, why would one need steel "like it used to be." Now, vise-grips on the other hand, yeah, wish the new ones were as good as my 30 year old pair...
customer_reviews.author: William Van Brunt

customer_reviews.title: Have a sharpener handy.
customer_reviews.text: Love the case and the chisels have a nice heft and seem to be good quality. I deducted a star because, unlike the others, the 1 inch chisel hadn't been sharpened. It wouldn't even cut into soft pine.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Good as long as you dont work them too hard
customer_reviews.text: The construction for the price ratio is out of control in your favor. These are amazing to work with. I want to carve my handsome face in the tree outside I like these so much. ----UPDATE---- After a few months of use with some great results (in pine) the tip broke off the smallest chisel. These are NOT solid all the way through. Instead they have a composite core in the middle. So two things - one you will not have these for years with heavy use and frequent sharpening and two, a bit of modest applied prying pressure will snap the tip. Mine broke in oak trim chiseling out a door catch.
customer_reviews.author: Ibeerian

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: These chisels surprised me as to how well the feel in the hand and the quality of the handles and metal. I am VERY pleased with these, especially for the low price. They come with a fairly nice edge on them but with a little bit of honing these perform as well as the $200 sets.
customer_reviews.author: PapaJ

customer_reviews.title: This item far exceeded my expectations. When I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: This item far exceeded my expectations. When I ordered the item, I had no idea the quality of the chisels and the case would be extraordinary. The chisels even have a protective blade guard on each chisel. They are neatly and securely packaged in a very high quality case that comes with the set of three chisels. I had to come out of my shell and post this review because I am truly blown away with the product. Outstanding in every way. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lovinit

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Most popular sizes, razor sharp, heavy duty for use with or without a hammer. Nice carrying case is a cool bonus. You will find no other better made for the price. HIGHLY recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Skullywag

customer_reviews.title: Despite my worries of them being made in China, they are a very heavy duty product and came well sharpened.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little weary of purchasing the newer Marples since they are manufactured in China now... but for such an Amazing price I couldn't resist.. And Im glad I grabbed these!, the case is great and the chisels came sharpened really well.. Seriously heavy duty chisels, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wrarrl

customer_reviews.title: great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and sharp from the factory. If you keep them safe, they should offer years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of chisels! I've used Marples for many years and I love 'em. The case is better than I thought it would be. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Arellano

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CHISELS
customer_reviews.text: Great tools not sure you need the also great container
customer_reviews.author: W. A. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tool very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tool edge was very sharp Brand new. Love the pouch keeps the edge of blade from getting damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Hammer Pad Moves
customer_reviews.text: They work for what chisels are used for but the metal end that you hit your hammer with twists around after literally just a few hits. It doesn't make these useless but it's a matter of time before they break off with this tendency so early in the game. I chiseled one single door blank and the metal pad kept moving. Kept having to twist it back which was difficult to do.
customer_reviews.author: wildcatgoal

customer_reviews.title: go to
customer_reviews.text: i have a lot of better chiesels but many times i throw these in my tool sack when i hit a project. if your are not a sharp freak these are good out of the box, if you are, a quick hone and they are even better. i like the way the case is, it protects both tool and fingers while not in use. they feel nice in your hand. they are a great go/ go along chiesel set
customer_reviews.author: artie2385

customer_reviews.title: Great for construction
customer_reviews.text: Great chisels I love the long length of them. Being in construction these are excellent easy to pry with when necessary, very sharp and strong. The folder helps keep them where you can find them when necessary
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like Irwin products and there chisels never disappoint. Definitely a good buy for any craftsman or handyman.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tools. Very sharp out of the box. Expected to have to sharpen the chisels when they were delivered but they don't need it. Only took a few minutes to run one halfway through my finger without sharpening it.
customer_reviews.author: offday

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chisels
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chisels thinking that I would mostly use them for construction/demolition work. I did not really expect them to take and keep a sharp edge. Well, they do, and are amazingly good for the price. Be ware that these are very large chisels, much larger than typical wood working chisels, but they can be used for detail work as well as general construction and are made to take a beating. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Luc

customer_reviews.title: great chisels for the price
customer_reviews.text: great chisels for the price, these are not cabinet shop chisels but they are perfect for carpentry and if you hit a nail by accident they are cheap enough to just replace
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: they seem durable with a nice handle with metal in the middle for the price
customer_reviews.text: its an OK chisel depending on the use. Ive only used it on finished solid oak (by finished i mean stained and lacker) and it was a lil bit hard to cut. they seem durable with a nice handle with metal in the middle for the price. but for everyday use i think it would not last very long
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good set of chisels.Nice weight to them.No problems encountered with purchase ad shipment.
customer_reviews.author: RAYMOND A HARTON

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Reeks of quality. They do need a better protective case to prevent holes. Working extremely well for me.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Mumma

customer_reviews.title: like marble or glass -- or even a formica table ...
customer_reviews.text: Made to last, if taken care of. They come very sharp, but I learned to finish them using 320-grit wet emory cloth. When wet, the emory cloth or sandpaper sticks to a smooth surface, like marble or glass -- or even a formica table top. After light finishing, these chisels can shave wood without even using a mallet.
customer_reviews.author: BobJ

customer_reviews.title: like a very good set and I'm looking forward to ...
customer_reviews.text: Whoever said this thing was gorgeous was right. It is totally gorgeous. It also seems, so far, like a very good set and I'm looking forward to putting it through the extended paces long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tools
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tools as I have come to expect over many years of using Irwin. Regardless of where they are made, Brazil for instance, the Irwin quality control os exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smith

customer_reviews.title: so far this have work great for me
customer_reviews.text: so far this have work great for me. they come pretty sharp from the factory and i have not needed to sharpen them yet. it does look like some sort of coating is applied to them because after my first use you can see it chipping off
customer_reviews.author: D V

customer_reviews.title: The pouch is excellent and they are comfortable in the hand
customer_reviews.text: These need time to be true but what chisel doesn't. The pouch is excellent and they are comfortable in the hand. The price is well worth the product but I wish it was still English steel.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Irwin Tools 1768781 Marples M500 Metal Strike Cap All Purpose 3-Piece
customer_reviews.text: Excellent well made tools, very solid. I am confident these will last a lifetime of use without problems. Pros: - Well made, good carrying case. - Sharp - Used a few times and they performed as expected. - Price Cons: - None that I could find
customer_reviews.author: IMS

customer_reviews.title: Good set.
customer_reviews.text: If you spend time putting a good personal sharpening on this set, you'll be very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Good and sharp
customer_reviews.text: These are my first set of chisels, so I can't say I have a lot to compare to. I used them to square up some mortises on a bed I was making and they did great. Accidently cut myself with them once, so handle them with care!
customer_reviews.author: BU Engineering Grad

customer_reviews.title: Good Utility Chisels
customer_reviews.text: These are well built chisels for the price but I have found them inadequate for high end woodworking. The factory sharpening must be extensively worked on to produce an edge for use on hardwoods. (2 hrs per chisel). The side bevels do not go far enough down the sides of the chisel and if you use them to clean up dovetails the 90 degree edge hits the sides of the dovetail and leave marks which then have to be cleaned up. For carpentry, electrical work, etc. they are a good tool box chisel but spend some more money if you want furniture grade tools.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Good vale
customer_reviews.text: Just received these, appear to be good value for $10, plus nice storage pouch. Definitely Not made in England. Only time will tell if they hold up to infrequent use.
customer_reviews.author: George S C

customer_reviews.title: The pro's use these.
customer_reviews.text: Irwin tools are professional quality that I'm happy to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This does amazing things. Just sharpen it with abrasive paper and ...
customer_reviews.text: This does amazing things. Just sharpen it with abrasive paper and flex cut gold bar. This will make this the sharpest tool in your tool box
customer_reviews.author: John Junho Kim

customer_reviews.title: These will last a while... sharp too!
customer_reviews.text: Probably only needed one of the chisels. Installed a kickplate for a deadbolt. Super sharp and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Marples wood chisels for General woodworking
customer_reviews.text: You can shave with these our if the box. The only reason I have bought a second set is because I had a workman who thought it was neat to cut nails with it. Goodbye workman. I have used super expensive chisels that come from the factory with a bur on it so you can put your own edge on it. But honestly. I can talk nice shavings with these and need no mallet. A word to the wise. Do not let a contractor touch your Marples. They are like I was as a kid when my mom had to explain that a butter knife was not a screw driver, I respect good tools and these are good tools.
customer_reviews.author: The Texan

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Chisels are good quality, sharp, and have a descent case to store them in. I have used them multiple times and I am still happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: bkamplain

customer_reviews.title: Cool tools
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them yet, but they will soon be put to good use. The price was right! And no problems with delivery time. Wow Amamzon, you sure have your @#$% together!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Banda

customer_reviews.title: Long not Short
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm the only one who would make this mistake. I thought from the image online that these chisels were short, maybe 6 inches long. I thought it would be a perfect set to have in my tool bag. In fact they are long and would not really be appropriate for a tool bag. The dimensions are given but not obvious. They certainly seemed like top quality tools just not what I was looking for. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Good product at a good price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable
customer_reviews.text: As a pro builder, I employ two sets of chisels: my cheap beaters, for serious abuse, and my well cared-for good set, used for chiseling pristine wood and nothing else. This is obviously the good set, and they've performed without fail. They're razor sharp, they're nice and long, and they're well-balanced and easy to control. The carry case and plastic blade caps are a nice bonus to help protect this nicely crafted set. For the price, you won't find more attractive tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Chisel set
customer_reviews.text: Great set with case. Feels good in the hand. The set has a full body, great for use with a mallet. The three sizes are right for most projects.
customer_reviews.author: John Rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and worked it across the hone and produced a nice edge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I like the case
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick, and I like the case!! I bought this for a friend, and he has used it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift for my son. He likes the case for keeping his tool box organized and the tips sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chisels
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of chisels for the price. I like the metal end caps on them, should help make them last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dww

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a great way for me ti carry a set o chisels with my tools
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: Didn't specify the handles were longer then others. To big for what I need them for. Now they will probably just get thrown away. Metal was also very soft.
customer_reviews.author: ANdrew Trudell

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Great tools well done and most of all the fare price
customer_reviews.author: jose leyva

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware!!!!!! Not as great as you would think
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to be pretty well at first and then, the smallest chisel chipped with normal use and the other two easily lose their edge, none of them are as well built as you would expect at first view. They are more so built to appear great for initial use so they gain great reviews, but then the real results of their quality shows and most don't update their reviews. Buyers beware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Chisel set
customer_reviews.text: I like this chisel set it is the standard set we issue to the employees. A smaller chisel would be nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P. Valenta

customer_reviews.title: but they have the blades have bent and dinged on me pretty badly. I have dropped them a bit
customer_reviews.text: I should probably give these 4stars, but they have the blades have bent and dinged on me pretty badly. I have dropped them a bit, but I think that they could be forged a little sturdier or something. The case is nice. The material that it's made of seems to just attract saw dust/shavings though. They hold up well with blows from a hammer and the overall construction seems pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent chisel set. Very well made and very useful. I use them for wood carving and general woodwork. Also they come in a nice packet to keep them together and prevent damage to the tools. If you need a general set of chisels for hanging doors and other woodwork you won't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Farrok

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be quality made..
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them very much. So I can't state the quality. They were packaged nicely and appear to be good quality. Time will tell..... UPDATE: After using them, I can say that these are decent. I've used them enough, to resharpen. These are better than my other chisels.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Chiseled - No way
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality chisels in three useful sizes. The case is of good quality and handy for keeping the chisel edges from damage.
customer_reviews.author: Oz Traveller

customer_reviews.title: your a fool if you don't get this set
customer_reviews.text: these are so nice that I still use my old chisel I really don't wanna scuff these babies, awesome rubber grip with a steel striking head and very very sharp, for 20 bucks there worth it just to take out and gaze upon. the heavy duty cloth case they come in has gotta be worth at the least 5 bucks its self, a matter of fact if I can still find these for 20 dollars again I'm gonna get another set. would also make a great gift especially for a carpenter or electrician that does a lot of custom residential work where modifying wood for fixtures or devices is essential GET THESE BABIES!
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Shattered like glass.
customer_reviews.text: I treat all my tools with the utmost care. Upon second use, the 1 inch chisel shattered like glass. This occurred while chiseling away at a soft pine door. Garbage made in China.
customer_reviews.author: SV - New York

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice small chisel set. Excellent for door hinges and hardware/
customer_reviews.author: Texadan

customer_reviews.title: Chisel
customer_reviews.text: pretty good for what they are. would buy it again in the near future. freight and price was fair. blah blah
customer_reviews.author: steven m

product_meta.title: IRWIN Marples Chisel Set with Wallet, 3-Piece (1768781)
product_meta.description:
The IRWIN Marples Construction Chisel Set is perfect for high-impact construction applications with large strike caps that can withstand repetitive hammer strikes. These chisels feature ergonomic handles with ProTouch Grips for reduced hand fatigue and high-quality hardened steel blades for superior performance and edge retention. Set includes 1/2", 3/4", and 1" chisels with a folding carrying wallet.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Irwin Tools 1768781 Marples M500 Metal Strike Cap All Purpose 3-Piece ChiselSet with Wallet Holder (1/2", 3/4", 1") features Quality Blades that are strong in design and stay sharp to the last inch. The Splitproof handle is strong enough to be hit with a hammer. Used by the professionals and the DIY enthusiast alike. The enclosed wallet features a hook and loop closure for easy storage and blade protection. This Chisel set is ideal for Carpenters, Woodworkers, Joiners, Builders, Plumbers, Electricians, Roofers, Floorers, and Home Owners (DIY).
feature_bullets: Large strike cap withstands repetitive hammer strikes
Ergonomic handles with ProTouch Grips are durable enough to withstand jobsite abuse
High quality hardened steel blade for superior performance and edge retention
Tough design is perfect for high-impact construction applications
Set includes 1/2", 3/4", and 1" chisels, and a folding carrying wallet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars167 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
